heading: Starwars
description: An Apollo GraphQL API server that wraps the Star Wars API (https://swapi.dev/) with a React SPA client that consumes the API
tech: Apollo GraphQL React TypeScipt Heroku NodeJS

heading: Cake Shop
description: A simple web site that displays cake shop data from an api and allows users to filter and search results.

heading: Xylophone React App
description: a Reactjs App that allows two users to play the Xylophone

heading: TicTacToe Game
description: a Reactjs App that allows two users to play the Tic-Tac-Toe game with move history

heading: SIMPLE TODO
description: a Todo App that creates a todo with a task description.Todo is then visible in the pending list with remove / complete functionality

heading: Quizz Game
description: a ReactJS app that allows the user to play a quick quizz game

heading: Game Of Thrones
description: a ReactJS app that reads from an online API to display all the characters from Game of Thrones by family

heading: Markdown Editor
description: a ReactJS Markdown editor that is able to parse  Heading 1 (#)  Heading 2 (##) Heading 3 (###) List item (-) Horizontal Rule (---) Bold text (**text**)

heading: Memory Game
description: a ReactJS App that allows users to play the Memory Game

heading: Landing Page Builder
description: a ReactJS App that creates  a landing page builder using Formik

heading: Crypto Trading Simulator
description: A fully functional ReactJS cryto currency trading simulator app that checks prices, buys & sells, view holdings & order history. Uses coingeckoAPI

heading: Magnifier Component.
description: A magnifier component: a commonly seen component on e-commerce websites

heading: Customize your car.
description: a ReactJS App that creates a car store where user can customize the car

heading: Chat Application.
description: a ReactJS App that allows users to login/logout to a chat app using Google Authentication.

heading: Rock Paper and Scissors using React.
description: a ReactJS App that allows users to play the ROCK / PAPER / SCISSORS game with the computer.

heading: Progressive-Web-App: Weather app.
description: a ReactJS App that retrieves local weather conditions for any location from the WeatherAPI. Can be installed as an App.

heading: Employee Registration With Material UI
description: a ReactJS App using Material UI library for Employee Registration with Validation.

heading: Basic React Library  App
description: A React app for a basic Library functionality that features a secure Signup/Login function. Uses Material-UI .

heading: Boiling Timer App
description: A minimal timer application where you can add multiple timers.

heading: Movies Website
description: React components movies website which gets the latest movies from TMDB API and when clicked displays the details of that movie

heading: Movies Watchlist
description: React components which displays a list of movies from TMDB API to add to a second Watchlist component and allows movie to be removed from the watchlist

heading: Avatar Picker Popup
description: Simple React component which is being passed a list of available avatars, popover closes when an avatar is selected or on clicking outside the pop-up

heading: Responsive Page Design
description: Site was designed to responded to changing screen widths: Mobile: 375px Tablet: 768px Desktop: 1440px
